production.name: Sup
production.description: "Who's free to hang" PWA. One-tap broadcasting to your squad with push notifications, real-time map with midpoint calculation, and bar suggestions near the group.
highlights: Real-time WebSocket subscriptions with 5s polling fallback
PostGIS geographic queries with WKB binary parsing
Haversine midpoint calculation for group meetup coordination
VAPID-signed Web Push via Supabase Edge Functions
Row-level security with bidirectional friendship model

production.name: MJ Growth Consulting
production.description: Marketing website for a Fortune 100 sales executive's growth advisory practice. Clean, minimal design with image carousel and contact form.
highlights: Touch-enabled carousel with swipe gesture detection and passive listeners
Intersection Observer API for scroll-triggered animations
Dynamic event scheduling with date comparison logic
Formspree API integration with live character validation
Non-render-blocking font loading with noscript fallback

production.name: Horizon Alliance
production.description: Alliance hub for Last War: Survival Game. Features event schedules, battle strategies, leadership roster, and alliance lore with a tactical military aesthetic.
highlights: Timezone-aware countdown timer with local-to-EST conversion
Complex game data modeling for multi-phase battle strategies
CSS 3D transforms for hamburger menu with state management
Semantic details/summary accordions with custom CSS markers
Multi-keyframe pulse and glow animations on event banners

experimental.name: ATC Radar Game
experimental.description: Air Traffic Control radar simulation game. Vector arrivals to runways, sequence departures, and manage waypoints to keep the skies safe.
highlights: Delta-time game loop with frame-rate-independent physics
6-state aircraft state machine with asymmetric turn/climb rates
3D separation detection (horizontal + vertical minimums)
Canvas radar sweep with radial gradient rendering

experimental.name: News Tracker
experimental.description: Real-time news aggregator tracking latest articles for Adobe, Coal Energy, and GLP-1s with smart ranking and auto-refresh.
highlights: Multi-factor ranking algorithm (recency + source reputation scoring)
Server-side API proxy for CORS bypass and key protection
Boolean search queries for precision topic filtering
Auto-refresh with proper interval cleanup pattern

experimental.name: New Year's Countdown 2026
experimental.description: Real-time countdown to New Year's Day with year progress tracker and particle visualization system.
highlights: DOM-based particle system with columnar stacking physics
Performance-capped rendering (4,500 particle limit, linear scaling)
Multi-layer glassmorphism with dynamic HSL glow effects
Framer Motion orchestrated sequential animations

experimental.name: Sports Scores
experimental.description: Live sports scores and game tracking across 17 leagues with intelligent ranking.
highlights: ESPN API aggregation across 17 leagues with Promise.all()
5-factor importance scoring (120-point composite ranking)
League diversity constraint for balanced feed curation
Temporal scoping with yesterday fallback strategy

experimental.name: Jackson Hole Snow Tracker
experimental.description: Real-time snow conditions dashboard with vintage split-flap display leaderboard and dynamic snowfall visualization.
highlights: Canvas particle system for data-responsive snowfall visualization
Split-flap display with CSS 3D rotateX transforms
Multi-site web scraping pipeline with fallback error handling
Hand-rendered Canvas bar charts with dynamic axis scaling
